title: [GAMEPLAY] Ekko's Q plays no sound on return
body:
Just as the title says, Ekko has a sound bug where his q isn't playing a sound when it goes on a return. It's very annoying, because visual timing in a teamfight with ekko is a clusterf**k if you can't see half of your spells on grouped champs.

Simple way to reproduce is to just q with ekko, and note that when it returns through any enemy, it plays no hit sound. Very annoying.

replies.body:
Hey TheSushian! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
